alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Orange; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Seminole, northwestern Brevard, east central Orange and southeastern Volusia Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 409 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Christmas, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Titusville, Christmas, Mims, Titusville Airport and Scottsmoor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Orange; Seminole
